FDM_CONFIG.NAME: f22
FDM_CONFIG.METRICS:
AC_WINGAREA 848.28 AC_WINGSPAN 44.5 AC_CHORD 23.0 AC_HTAILAREA 238.9 AC_HTAILARM 18.66 AC_VTAILAREA 79.1 AC_LV 18.66 AC_IXX 40843 AC_IYY 204751 AC_IZZ 258201 AC_IXZ 0 AC_EMPTYWT 29446.93 AC_AERORP {X Y Z} AC_CGLOC {X Y Z} AC_EYEPTLOC {X Y Z}
AC_POINTMASS {weight X Y Z}

AXIS.NAME: LIFT
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Lift_due_to_pitch_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | velocities/q-aero-rad_sec | aero/ci2vel R 2.7711

AERODYNAMICS.AXIS:
Drag_due_to_alpha aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft 0.1786
COEFFICIENT NAME="CDo" TYPE="VALUE"> Drag_at_zero_lift 17 velocities/mach-norm aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft 0.0111
COEFFICIENT NAME="CDzero" TYPE="VALUE"> Drag_at_zero_lift aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft 0.0101

Roll_moment_due_to_beta aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/beta-rad 0.0176
COEFFICIENT NAME="Clbdot" TYPE="VALUE"> Roll_moment_due_to_beta_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/betadot-rad_sec -0.0037
COEFFICIENT NAME="ClDa" TYPE="VALUE"> Roll_moment_due_to_aileron aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | fcs/left-aileron-pos-rad 0.0489

AXIS.NAME: PITCH
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Pitch_moment_due_to_alpha_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | aero/ci2vel | aero/alphadot-rad_sec -1.5611
Pitch_moment_due_to_pitch_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/cbarw-ft | aero/ci2vel | velocities/q-rad_sec -1.7830

AXIS.NAME: YAW
AXIS.COEFFICIENT: Yaw_moment_due_to_roll_rate aero/qbar-psf | metrics/Sw-sqft | metrics/bw-ft | aero/bi2vel | velocities/p-rad_sec -0.0035

FDM_CONFIG.OUTPUT: RATE_IN_HZ {rate} SIMULATION OFF ATMOSPHERE ON MASSPROPS ON AEROSURFACES ON RATES ON VELOCITIES ON FORCES ON MOMENTS ON POSITION ON COEFFICIENTS ON GROUND_REACTIONS ON FCS ON PROPULSION ON
